entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 March 2023
